allow: Bash("C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\Client SDK\ODBC\170\Tools\Binn\SQLCMD.EXE" -S "server-pc\wizsoft2" -d "Sh.Autofit" -U "issa" -P "5060977Ih" -Q "SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = ''VehicleRegistrations'' AND COLUMN_NAME IN (''IsOffRoad'', ''IsPersonalImport'', ''SourceResourceId'', ''ConsolidatedModelId'')")

Bash("C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\Client SDK\ODBC\170\Tools\Binn\SQLCMD.EXE" -S "server-pc\wizsoft2" -d "Sh.Autofit" -U "issa" -P "5060977Ih" -Q "SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON; IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.indexes WHERE name = ''IX_VehicleRegistrations_ConsolidatedModelId'' AND object_id = OBJECT_ID(''VehicleRegistrations'')) CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX IX_VehicleRegistrations_ConsolidatedModelId ON VehicleRegistrations(ConsolidatedModelId) WHERE ConsolidatedModelId IS NOT NULL;")
